DOC.brief_summary: Will adult liver transplant patient provide physical activity ( walk ) instruction increase physical activity perceive improve quality life ?
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult patient 1865 year age receive liver transplant Mayo Clinic Jacksonville . Adult patient 521 day post liver transplant . Must follow Mayo Clinic Jacksonville 4 month postoperatively . Approved hepatologist and/or transplant surgeon participate . Exclusion criterion : Patients active infection Patients encephalopathy cognitive dysfunction Patients receive combine liverkidney transplant Patients severe debility Patients require assistance ambulate .
